documents.document: Made a cinnamon roll apple pie. I reckon there's probably enough sugar in it to knock out a small child but it smelâ€¦ https://t.co/y4VJrWD8ZD
Sneaky Pete is brilliant. Worth the binge watch. https://t.co/ydYJYCBp4n
Saw Stereophonics in my dream last night, so that was pretty neat.
https://t.co/r9rsQjButz 10/10 song to hoover to. HUNK O' HUNK OF BURNIN' LOVE
@BillyMiles1 Mate, I just give the world what it wants. Totally works!
@BillyMiles1 Just making an observation of a mans fist
Is there anything more mesmerising than a dark hair/ blue eyes combo?
Everywhere is out of crumpets. The end is nigh.
That live video of Don't Let The Sun Go Down On Me used to make me tear up but I've just discovered it now makes me full on ugly cry.
Is Billy Ray Cyrus going through an emo phase? https://t.co/3hjHwnvKeY
@amynatasha62 Tim Allen is welcome in the daytime though
@amynatasha62 I'm slightly uncomfortable with the fact that an old man can just let himself into my house in the middle of the night
@amynatasha62 No conspiracy, I saw him! I don't have a proper chimney for Santa to get down anyway
@amynatasha62 I reckon they work together. They're like the Mario bros
Santa is a white van man.
@amynatasha62 Gotta scrub the biro off first! Good size for a loaded jacket potato though!
This is the most stupid thing I have ever seen. https://t.co/8dVOYK8ELW
@anthony_ntl I laughed for at least 10 minutes. Someone said they're sure you're the lead vocalist for RHCP so doing very well
@anthony_ntl Can we appreciate this please? You absolute drug lord https://t.co/rVurGITyFT
Got another 1.4kg tin of coffee that should keep my pulse going at both an alarming and underwhelming rate for a few weeks. Staying alive.
I reckon the biscuit world peaked at chocolate digestive.
Right about everything @Daniel_Sloss
@BillyMiles1 Should've known! Classic anti-ageing routine.
@BillyMiles1 Please do! Also ask how he manages to look so young.
@Daniel_Sloss Guess I have to now!
Some guy literally just had a piss opposite my house. Seriously.
Contemplating on whether to be an A grade loser and go to the @Daniel_Sloss show tonight on my own ðŸ¤”
About to get my parsnips buttered. https://t.co/9vKsd4RlTu
Yeah, but why is Black Friday starting on a Monday? ðŸ¤”ðŸ˜¶
I just remembered that I cheated at a game of pin the tail on the donkey when I was 7 and now i'm plagued with guilt.
Just bit into a @sainsburys "chocolate" donut and got a mouthful of raspberry jam. Can we believe anything anyone says anymore?!
@SarahStylz Yes! I was looking at handmade ideas and kept seeing bacon salt, a 'bacon bouquet', bacon jam and bacon candy come up! ðŸ˜…
Why are literally all men's gift ideas alcohol, bacon, sport or leather related?!
If anything makes me excited for QI's return, it's Corey Taylor being in an episode. What an unexpected, brilliant booking!
A good way to know your sauce is heated as you're about to serve it, is to have it bubble up & hit you right in the inner corner of your eye
I've reminded myself of Dairy Milk with Shortcake biscuit bars and now my heart aches again for the piece of heaven that Cadburys tore away
The selection of catalogues/magazines in my hotel room prove that I am a peasant compared to their usual clientele https://t.co/TbH9nC5fsM
@amynatasha62 These are Jamie's little kitties!
These two ðŸ˜ #timonandpumbaa https://t.co/l6A1W86j6p
I've just cheered myself up. Put my hand in my pyjama pocket and found a ring I thought I lost at a bar 8 months ago! ðŸŽ‰
@Blajkofficial are a bit bloody good, aren't they?!
I flicked through the Argos catalogue & came across a child's doll that's selling point was that it "looks, feels & smells like a real baby"
Opened my new book for the first time and thought I'd have a quick look at the photo pages.. First thing I see... ðŸ˜³ https://t.co/pLDumBakF5
I still don't see how all that was the better option over staying and extra few days ðŸ˜…
Just stepped into my house. 25 hours it took to get here! A journey that should have taken about 6.5 in total. Mamma Mia.
I've only had two hours sleep after getting up at 3.30 too ðŸ˜… god damn. This is going to be looong. I just want to stay here. Screw England.
Now I have 4 more hours of waiting at Naples airport. A few hours of travelling to Rome and 13 hours until my new flight ðŸ˜¨
Gah. Almost got two extra days in Italy but someone brought up the idea of trying to get a flight out of Rome.
My flight is cancelled and we are no longer in the EU. SO THAT'S COOL. Though I would be happy to be stuck in Italy.
Well it's not every day an Italian offers to drive you along the Amalfi coast at night.
@SarahStylz It'll be incredible difficult though. It won't be the same workers rights. Can't move as freely
@SarahStylz it feels like I'll be in-prisoned there. I'm happy others are happy & I know I'm being selfish but I had strong views on this
@SarahStylz My dreams have never been to stay in the UK. What I did want to do has now become incredibly hard if not virtually impossible.
And I realise I sound like a 14 year old emo but I think it's allowed.
@Captain_Bold No, I've been imprisoned.
@Captain_Bold Nope. The older generations have crushed my dreams. Not fine. No faith.
Well that was the worst news to wake up to. Absolutely devastated. My future dream is fucked. Never felt more ashamed to be British.
@SarahStylz it's too late now! â˜¹ï¸ perhaps I can hint tomorrow though!! ðŸ˜‰
Had a nice birthday for once! Went to Pompeii and learnt a bit about the history. That's my kind of day! Culture over clubs any day!
I've said it before and I'll say it again. I love Italy and the people. â¤ï¸ðŸ‡­ðŸ‡ºðŸ’š
Mellow yellow https://t.co/AjPIdpGseD
A good 70, that is.
I have hope for the future. My grandad is 91 today and he doesn't even look much older than 70.
Bit unfortunate for the Peacocks store in town as the lights behind 'PEA' have gone out so it's now a big illuminated sign that says 'COCKS'
Okay, I appreciate that one. https://t.co/09DezzGYwm
Can't even say that's the first time it's happened, either. ðŸ±
Went upstairs for literally 15 seconds and came back down to see a random cat in my house.
Judging by my dream last night, I'd say I've watched too much American Horror Story recently. #jesushchrist
I miss the tackiness of the 00s
I've probably got a bit too much love for this band. https://t.co/okXbkAIqHa
It's that time again. @muse https://t.co/aJDdlCQABr
"Only 95 calories per pack" - yeah, that's because there's only NINE crisps in here. What the hell, man.
I've consumed an utterly offensive amount of carbs today.
No Mexican dish (for one) is complete without the juice of a whole damn lime.
Deadpool is a bit good, isn't it? #fatgandalf
Thanks for deleting all my music, iTunes. That was a real cool move
I've woken up stupidly early for working at 7. Go me denying myself extra sleep ðŸ‘ðŸ¼
https://t.co/GL4eMYyfSL So in love with this video.
So dark, I feel like I've come down for a midnight snack
That's the second time I've been asked for my age when ordering a hot drink in Waitrose. Do I really look that young?!
Can't beat a Warburton's crumpet.
Sitting next to some people trying to convince their friend to take out a funeral policy, get a free tv out of them and then cancel it
@Captain_Bold Happy New Year to you, too!
How I imagine people to be feeling today. https://t.co/66viC6P2io
New year, same me.
What a lovely feeling it is to actually be paid for the hours you do.
@Merovin90 Their terms and conditions changed and if you didn't object to them before they won't do anything about it
Well pissed. I saved up 1500 Disney movie rewards points and they've wiped them all and won't give them back. Just as I was going to use 'em
@amycphotog That's because it made its way into one of mine!
@amycphotog Which become more fun after a little something something!
@amycphotog Oh! That is brilliant!
@amycphotog As in miniature versions of things? I've seen some with mini box graters in before!
Two different days, from two separate boxes and I get another fucking yoyo in my cracker.
Jamie and Jimmy's Friday Night Feast.... I'm sorry, are you telling me Orlando Bloom was in Southend?!
I think it's safe to say @amycphotog is nothing short of a genius
Well, I did have nice matte black and tartan nails.. for a few hours.
Nothing quite like receiving a letter from the student loans company to kill your Friday vibe.
I asked the guy in Hamley's to stop bullying me and he said 'I'm not bullying you, I'm victimising you! Big difference'.. Is there though?!
I have the worst (first world) luck. I must have shattered a fucking hall of mirrors.
Oh. Turns out I did have the right key. So I just sat outside in the cold like an idiot for 25 minutes for absolutely no reason at all.
